about.name: Luke Dalton
about.blurb: Software engineer interested in joining a great remote team, and build awesome solutions.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Currently I'm working on Allied's main desktop application (C#/.NET) that tracks thousands of loans, and the information related to those loans. I'm part of the software engineer team that is going to start the design and implementation of our new microservice architecture.

work.title: System Software Engineer
work.description: I developed and integrated software for flight simulators, updated legacy (C++) code, engineering lead on several successful and on-time projects, as well as troubleshot possible software issues for customers.

work.title: Systems Administrator
work.description: At Kirby I deployed, troubleshot, and maintained PCs and servers (hardware & software). In addition, I created user accounts, maintained intranet page, created file shares, programmed telephone and door systems, performed minor networking tasks, and worked on pretty much anything electronic.
work.cooperation: Worked with members of other departments to select, and implement a new time keeping system.  Helped coordinate tearing down, moving, and rebuilding several departments' workspace during a remodel.  Deployed and maintain virtual environment. Recipient of several thank you cards for exceptional attitude, and helpfulness.

work.title: Teacher's Assistant
work.description: Assisted students with learning, and troubleshooting the Java programming language, and computer programming basics.
